name: com.meta.xr.sdk.interaction
description: Provides the core implementations of all the provided interaction models along with necessary shaders, materials, and prefabs.

samples.description: Access Showcase and Integration Samples Here : GitHub
Requires Unity OpenXR Plugin (com.unity.xr.openxr), along with Unity XR Hands (com.unity.xr.hands) for hand tracking.
